body: At 2nd level, a cloistered cleric gains a +2 bonus on skill checks, caster level checks, and saving throws if such rolls pertain to mundane or magical glyphs, runes, scrolls, symbols, and other writings.
name: Well-Read
url: pfsrd://Ultimate Magic/Rules/Spellcasting Class Options/Cleric/Cleric Archetypes/Cloistered Cleric/Well-Read
